{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.06694v1", "title": "Comparison of Frobenius algebra structures on Calabi-Yau toric
  hypersurfaces", "summary": "We establish an isomorphism between two Frobenius algebra structures, termed
CY and LG, on the primitive cohomology of a smooth Calabi--Yau hypersurface in
a simplicial Gorenstein toric Fano variety. As an application of our comparison
isomorphism, we observe the existence of a Frobenius manifold structure on a
finite-dimensional subalgebra of the Jacobian algebra of a homogeneous
polynomial which may exhibit a non-compact singularity locus.", "main_category": "math.AG", "categories": "math.AG,math-ph,math.MP", "published": "2025-04-09T08:53:48Z"}
